attributes.action: Prevent a 2nd EU Referendum from happening
attributes.additional_details: The ordinary decent people of this country have spoken and they want an exit from the EU. This Referendum result should not be changed in anyway. Neither should the Referendum be redone.
attributes.background: Majority (51.9%) of the United Kingdom voted to leave the European Union on June 23rd. It is not in the Majority voters interests to hold a 2nd Referendum so the minority can receive the results they desire.
